table.column: , 10881, After all functions are compiled and linked into a single design
, , After user unroll and inline pragmas are applied
(1) unroll, 760108 *, user unroll pragmas are applied
(2) simplification, 454270 *, simplification of applied user unroll pragmas
(3) inline, 453806 *, user inline pragmas are applied
(4) simplification, 403868 *, simplification of applied user inline pragmas
, , After user array partition and struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas are applied
(1) array partition, 610363 *, user array partition pragmas are applied
(2) simplification, 405613 *, simplification of applied user array partition & struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas
(3) aggregate/disaggregate , 405620 *, user struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas are applied
(4) array reshape, 422351 *, apply array reshape pragmas
(5) access patterns, 419749 *, array access pattern optmizations
, , After transformations are applied to meet performance pragma targets
(1) loop simplification, 309913 *, loop and instruction simplification
(2) parallelization, 224246 *, loops are unrolled or pipelined to meet performance targets
(3) array partition, 223470 *, arrays are partitioned to meet performance targets
(4) simplification, 222066 *, simplification of design after performance transformations
, , After hardware transfomations
(1) lowering, 218412 *, initial conversion to HW specific instructions
(2) optimizations, 221385 *, high level synthesis optimizations

item.name: Instructions per Function for each Compilation Phase

note.desc: Exceeded design size warning message threshold

table.column: 100000, Show a warning when total design instructions exceeds this value
